With a background in financial and technology management, I am completing a Masters degree in Software Engineering with a certificate in Data Science.

I aim to combine my business and technical skills to deliver A.I. solutions to small and medium-sized businesses.

I believe that Deep Learning can be applied to a broad range of business topics and is an underutilized success factor. My goal is to help businesses exploit advanced technologies to improve their customers’ experience while increasing employee satisfaction and performance.
